comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content:
The caption is misspelled. The Bain note spells it Eustis. A Miss H. Eustis also appears here:

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5537490742/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
The venue appears to be the stepped observation boxes at the Piping Rock Country Club, in Locust Valley, Long Island:
